EmailTemplate.subject: Corian® Solid Surface: Acknowledgement registration of Case {!Case.CaseNumber}.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear customer,
<?xml:namespace prefix = o />
Thank you for registering your complaint which we have registered with reference number {!Case.CaseNumber}. We’ll do our utmost to have your complaint solved in the shortest time possible.
In order to complete your file, we would still need a copy of the installation invoice, the attached form C completed and pictures of the top and the impacted area(s).
Upon completion of your file, we will contact our service centre or Industrial Partner to settle a date for an inspection / repair.
By means of this email, we are informing you of our contact details.
May we kindly ask you to refer to the complaint number when responding?
Should you have any questions or remarks, do not hesitate to contact us.
Friendly Regards,
{!Case.OwnerFullName}
QN & Warranty Assistant
Tel: {!Case.OwnerPhone}
{!Case.OwnerEmail}
